text: Vincent Jules Auriol (; 27 August 1884 â€“ 1 January 1966) was a French politician. He was President of France from 1947 to 1954.See Auriol's extensive biography by Jacques Batigne on lauragais-patrimoine.fr ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Presidents of France Category:Presidents of the National Assembly (France) Category:People from Haute-Garonne Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:20th-century presidents of France
